Privacy Policy

Last updated: February 16, 2026

1. Introduction

TULASI STORES ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting the privacy of our users. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our billing app available on Android, Windows, and Web platforms.

2. Information We Collect

We collect the following types of information:

  • Account Information: Name, email address, phone number, and business name when you create an account.
  • Business Data: Products, inventory, bills, customer records (khata), and reports that you create within the app.
  • Device Information: Device type, operating system, and app version for troubleshooting and compatibility.
  • Usage Data: App usage patterns and feature interactions to improve our services.

3. How We Use Your Information

  • To provide and maintain the TULASI STORES billing app services.
  • To sync your business data across devices when you are online.
  • To send important notifications about your account or app updates.
  • To improve app performance, fix bugs, and develop new features.
  • To provide customer support when you contact us.

4. Offline Mode & Data Storage

TULASI STORES works 100% offline. Your business data is stored locally on your device first and synced to our secure cloud servers (powered by Google Firebase) only when you have an internet connection. You retain full control of your data at all times.

5. Data Security

We take data security seriously. Your data is protected using:

  • SSL/TLS encryption for all data in transit.
  • Firebase Security Rules to ensure only you can access your data.
  • Secure authentication through Google Firebase Authentication.
  • Regular security audits and updates.

6. Data Sharing

We do not sell, trade, or share your personal or business data with third parties. Your business data belongs to you. We only use third-party services (Google Firebase) for secure data storage and authentication.

7. Your Rights

You have the right to:

  • Access your personal data stored in our systems.
  • Export your business data (bills, inventory, reports) at any time.
  • Delete your account and all associated data by contacting us.
  • Update your account information from within the app.

8. Children's Privacy

TULASI STORES is intended for business use by adults. We do not knowingly collect information from children under 13 years of age.

9. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes through the app or via email. Continued use of the app after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.

10. Contact Us

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or your data, please contact us:

  • Email: support@tulasierp.com
  • Website: stores.tulasierp.com
  • In-app: Go to Support ‚Üí Contact in the app
